attributes.name: Shopify

wrapContent.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<definitions>
   <definition>
      <name>SAP S/4HANA Cloud Outbound Deliveries</name>
      <namespace>shopifyaccelerator</namespace>
      <key>s_4hana_cloud_outbound_deliveries</key>
      <description>Represents the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Outbound Deliveries associated with this order</description>
      <type>list.single_line_text_field</type>
      <ownerType>ORDER</ownerType>
      <pin>true</pin>
   </definition>
   <definition>
      <name>SAP S/4HANA Cloud Order ID</name>
      <namespace>shopifyaccelerator</namespace>
      <key>s_4hana_cloud_order_id</key>
      <description>Represents the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Sales Order ID</description>
      <type>single_line_text_field</type>
      <ownerType>ORDER</ownerType>
      <pin>true</pin>
   </definition>
   <definition>
      <name>SAP S/4HANA Cloud Order Cancelled</name>
      <namespace>shopifyaccelerator</namespace>
      <key>s_4hana_cloud_order_cancelled</key>
      <description>Represents whether the Cancelled Order in Shopify has been also cancelled in SAP S/4HANA Cloud</description>
      <type>boolean</type>
      <ownerType>ORDER</ownerType>
      <pin>true</pin>
   </definition>
   <definition>
      <name>SAP S/4HANA Cloud Business Partner ID</name>
      <namespace>shopifyaccelerator</namespace>
      <key>s_4hana_cloud_business_partner_id</key>
      <description>Represents the SAP S/4HANA Cloud Business Partner ID associated with this customer</description>
      <type>single_line_text_field</type>
      <ownerType>CUSTOMER</ownerType>
      <pin>true</pin>
   </definition>
<definition>
      <name>SAP S/4HANA Cloud Replicated Customer Returns</name>
      <namespace>shopifyaccelerator</namespace>
      <key>s_4hana_cloud_replicated_customer_returns</key>
      <description>Represents the Order Returns replicated to SAP S/4HANA Cloud</description>
      <type>json</type>
      <ownerType>ORDER</ownerType>
      <pin>true</pin>
   </definition>
</definitions>
